TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit AutomationElement/AutomationElementInformation extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 包含由 或 属性使用的属性访问器。

span.span: Contains the property accessors used by the or properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以直接从访问的属性并; 不需要检索结构本身。The properties can be accessed directly from and ; you do not need to retrieve the structure itself. 也可以通过检索此结构中的属性并，使用相应的标识符从。The properties in this structure can also be retrieved by using and , using the corresponding identifiers from . 例如，属性由字段。For example, The property is identified by the field. 有关这些标识符; 参考页上提供了有关各个属性的详细信息请参阅备注部分中的每个参考主题中的链接。More information about the individual properties is available on the reference pages for those identifiers; see the link in the Remarks section of each reference topic. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将此结构中检索属性。The following example shows how the property is retrieved from this structure. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#106)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#106)]

span.span: Get UI Automation Element Properties

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AcceleratorKey As String
public: property System::String ^ AcceleratorKey { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个包含元素快捷键组合的字符串。

span.span: Gets a string containing the accelerator key combinations for the element.

value.span: 用于调用与元素关联的操作的键组合序列。

span.span: The sequence of key combinations that invoke an action associated with the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快捷键组合调用操作。Accelerator key combinations invoke an action. 例如，CTRL + O 常用于调用**文件打开**对话框。For example, CTRL + O is often used to invoke the **File Open** dialog box. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 元素具有快捷键的 key 属性始终设置实现类。elements that have the accelerator key property set always implement the class. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AccessKey As String
public: property System::String ^ AccessKey { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个包含元素的访问键字符的字符串。

span.span: Gets a string containing the access key character for the element.

value.span: 与一个元素关联的、用于激活该元素的字符。

span.span: The character, associated with an element, that is used to activate that element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 访问密钥是中的菜单、 菜单项或如激活附加的菜单函数的按钮控件的标签文本的字符。An access key is a character in the text of a menu, menu item, or label of a control such as a button that activates the attached menu function. 例如，字母"O"通常用于调用**开放**文件中的通用对话框**文件**菜单。For example, the letter "O" is often used to invoke the **Open** file common dialog box from a **File** menu. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 将访问密钥属性始终设置的元素实现类。elements that have the access key property set always implement the class. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AutomationId As String
public: property System::String ^ AutomationId { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，其中包含元素的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)]。

span.span: Gets a string containing the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] for the element.

value.span: ID 是唯一的而在其容器内的同级的元素。

span.span: An ID for an element that is unique among siblings within its container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当它可用时的元素应该始终具有与本地语言无关的应用程序的任何实例中相同。When it is available the of an element is expected to always be the same in any instance of the application regardless of the local language. 值应为唯一的而同级元素，但不是一定是唯一跨整个桌面。The value should be unique among sibling elements but not necessarily unique across the entire desktop. 例如，应用程序的多个实例或 Microsoft Windows 资源管理器中的多个文件夹视图可能包含具有相同的元素，如"SystemMenuBar"。For example, multiple instances of an application, or multiple folder views in Microsoft Windows Explorer, may contain elements with the same , such as "SystemMenuBar". 尽管支持始终在此属性不强制性更好的可测试性，建议。While support of an is always recommended for better testability, this property is not mandatory. 只要它受支持，创建测试自动化脚本，无论 UI 语言运行时很有用。Where it is supported, an is useful for creating test automation scripts that run regardless of UI language. 客户端应做任何假设有关s 公开的其他应用程序。Clients should make no assumptions regarding the s exposed by other applications. 不一定能保证跨不同的版本保持不变或生成的应用程序。An is not necessarily guaranteed to be stable across different releases or builds of an application. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BoundingRectangle As Rect
public: property System::Windows::Rect BoundingRectangle { System::Windows::Rect get(); };

summary.span: 获取完全包围元素的矩形的坐标。

span.span: Gets the coordinates of the rectangle that completely encloses the element.

value.span: 包围矩形的点坐标。

span.span: The point coordinates of the enclosing rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的矩形可以包含不是可单击的点。The returned rectangle can contain points that are not clickable. 可能发生这种情况的实例时，将[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]项具有的形状不规则或可单击区域，或由其他遮盖[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素。Instances where this could happen are when the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] item has an irregular shape or clickable region, or it is obscured by other [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClassName As String
public: property System::String ^ ClassName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，其中包含由控件开发人员分配的元素的类名称。

span.span: Gets a string containing the class name of the element as assigned by the control developer.

value.span: 由控件开发人员分配的类名称。

span.span: The class name assigned by the control developer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值是依赖于实现的。The value of this property is implementation-dependent. 属性可在测试环境中。The property is useful in testing environments. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ControlType As ControlType
public: property System::Windows::Automation::ControlType ^ ControlType { System::Windows::Automation::ControlType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取元素的 。

span.span: Gets the of the element.

value.span: 此元素的交互模型。

span.span: The interaction model for this element.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件类型说明已知的交互模型任意[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素而不依赖于本地化的控件类型或复杂的逻辑规则组合起来。Control type describes a known interaction model for arbitrary [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements without relying on a localized control type or combination of complex logic rules. 在运行时在其中可以更改此属性的唯一情况是支持的控件。The only case where this property can change at run time is for a control that supports . 例如， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] ListView 控件，可以从更改到，取决于当前视图。An example is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] ListView control, which can change from to , depending on the current view. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

span.span: UI Automation Control Types

span.span: UI Automation Control Types Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FrameworkId As String
public: property System::String ^ FrameworkId { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取基础 UI 框架的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the underlying UI framework.

value.span: UI 框架的名称，例如“Win32”、“WinForm”或“DirectUI”。

span.span: The name of the UI framework, such as "Win32", "WinForm", or "DirectUI".

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的属性的值的类型是。Return values of the property are of type . 默认值为一个空字符串。The default value is an empty string. 此属性允许应用程序适用于整个 UI 框架的特殊情况。This property enables applications to apply special cases to entire UI frameworks. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasKeyboardFocus As Boolean
public: property bool HasKeyboardFocus { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示此元素是否具有键盘焦点。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the element has keyboard focus.

value.span: 如果此元素具有键盘焦点，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element has keyboard focus; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果容器中的元素具有焦点，的容器元素也是如此。If an element within a container has focus, is also true for the container element. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HelpText As String
public: property System::String ^ HelpText { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与元素关联的帮助文本。

span.span: Gets the help text associated with the element.

value.span: 元素的工具提示帮助文本。

span.span: The tooltip help text for the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsContentElement As Boolean
public: property bool IsContentElement { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定元素是否为内容元素。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the element is a content element.

value.span: 如果元素为内容元素，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element is a content element; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容元素包含向用户显示的数据。A content element contains data that is presented to the user. 内容元素的示例是在列表框或按钮出现在对话框中的项。Examples of content elements are the items in a list box or a button on a dialog box. 非内容元素，也称为外围元素，通常用于操作的复合控件; 中的内容例如，下拉列表控件上的按钮。Non-content elements, also called peripheral elements, are typically used to manipulate the content in a composite control; for example, the button on a drop-down control. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

span.span: UI Automation Tree Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsControlElement As Boolean
public: property bool IsControlElement { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示元素是否以控件的形式查看。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the element is viewed as a control.

value.span: 如果元素以控件的形式查看，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element is viewed as a control; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

span.span: UI Automation Tree Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsEnabled As Boolean
public: property bool IsEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已启用由 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]元素引用的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 项。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] item referenced by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is enabled.

value.span: 如果已启用控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control is enabled; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性可以更改由于[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]交互。The value of the property can change because of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] interactions. 应通过调用获取更新的缓存如果的值发出的缓存请求后，可能已更改属性。You should get an updated cache by calling if the value of the property might have changed since you issued the cache request. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsKeyboardFocusable As Boolean
public: property bool IsKeyboardFocusable { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素是否可接受键盘焦点。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element can accept keyboard focus.

value.span: 如果元素可接收键盘焦点，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control can receive keyboard focus; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsOffscreen As Boolean
public: property bool IsOffscreen { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素在屏幕上是否可见。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is visible on the screen.

value.span: 如果控件不可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control is not visible; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个布尔值，该值指示是否完全滚动元素 （例如，列表框中的项的容器对象的视区外是） 或折叠起来 （例如树视图中，菜单中或最小化的窗口中的项），从视图。A Boolean value that indicates if an element is completely scrolled (for example, an item in a list box is outside the viewport of the container object) or collapsed (for example, an item in a tree view, menu, or a minimized window) out of view. 如果元素具有可单击的点可能会导致其获得焦点，它被视为可在屏幕上，即使该元素的部分是屏幕上。If the element has a clickable point that can cause it to be focused, it is considered to be onscreen even when a portion of the element is off screen. 属性的值不受其他窗口，或该元素是否在特定监视器上可见的阻挡物。The value of the property is not affected by occlusion by other windows, or by whether the element is visible on a specific monitor. IsOffscreen 时`true,`滚动或从视图中，但仍然是一部分用户界面，在最终用户感觉的元素可以恢复到视图的简单操作，如滚动或单击下拉列表控件。When IsOffscreen is `true,` an element that is scrolled or collapsed out of view, but is still part of the end-users perception of the UI, can be brought back into view by simple manipulation, such as scrolling or clicking on a drop-down control. 如果该元素是最终用户不理解或认为是"以编程方式隐藏"（例如对话框关闭，但其中下划线对象缓存应用程序），则它应删除从元素树，而无需设置的值为 IsOffscreen `true`。If the element is something that the end-user does not perceive at all or is referred to as being "programmatically hidden" (for example, a dialog box that has been dismissed but where the underlining object is cached by the application) then it should be removed from the element tree rather than setting the value of IsOffscreen to `true`. 值是何时`true`对于容器，它也是`true`容器元素的子代。When the value is `true` for a container, it is also `true` for the container element's descendants. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsPassword As Boolean
public: property bool IsPassword { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素是否包含受保护的内容。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element contains protected content.

value.span: 如果元素包含受保护的内容，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element contains protected content; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性，如屏幕读取器的应用程序以确定是否应朗读控件的文本内容。This property enables applications such as screen-readers to determine whether the text content of a control should be read aloud. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsRequiredForForm As Boolean
public: property bool IsRequiredForForm { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否需要在窗体上填充 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is required to be filled out on a form.

value.span: 如果需要填充元素，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element is required to be filled out; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ItemStatus As String
public: property System::String ^ ItemStatus { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取元素内某一项的状态说明。

span.span: Gets a description of the status of an item within an element.

value.span: 状态的说明。

span.span: The description of the status.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使客户端来确定元素是否传达有关某个项的状态。This property enables a client to ascertain whether an element is conveying status about an item. 例如，与消息传送应用程序中的联系人关联的项可能为"忙碌"或"已连接"。For example, an item associated with a contact in a messaging application might be "Busy" or "Connected". 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ItemType As String
public: property System::String ^ ItemType { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个项的类型说明。

span.span: Gets a description of the type of an item.

value.span: 一个描述项的本地化字符串。

span.span: A localized string that describes the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于获取有关列表、 树视图中或数据网格中的项的信息。This property is used to obtain information about items in a list, tree view, or data grid. 例如，文件目录视图中的项可能是"文档文件"或"文件夹"。For example, an item in a file directory view might be a "Document File" or a "Folder". 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LabeledBy As AutomationElement

summary.span: 获取包含此元素的文本标签的元素。

span.span: Gets the element that contains the text label for this element.

value.span: 作为此元素的标签的元素。

span.span: The element that is the label for this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以用于检索，例如，组合框的静态文本标签。This property could be used to retrieve, for example, the static text label for a combo box. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LocalizedControlType As String
public: property System::String ^ LocalizedControlType { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取控件类型的说明。

span.span: Gets a description of the control type.

value.span: 控件类型（如“button”）的本地化说明。

span.span: A localized description of the control type, such as "button".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取元素的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the element.

value.span: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]元素的名称。

span.span: The name of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素的名称可用于查找中的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素目录树元素上不支持属性。The name of an element can be used to find the element in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree when the property is not supported on the element. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将检索属性。The following example shows how the property is retrieved. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#106)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#106)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NativeWindowHandle As Integer
public: property int NativeWindowHandle { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取元素窗口的句柄。

span.span: Gets the handle of the element's window.

value.span: 窗口的句柄（如果存在）；否则为 0。

span.span: The handle of the window, if one exists; otherwise 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Orientation As OrientationType

summary.span: 获取控件的方向。

span.span: Gets the orientation of the control.

value.span: 方向。

span.span: The orientation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性被支持控件，如滚动条和滑块可以具有垂直或水平方向。This property is supported by controls such as scroll bars and sliders that can have either a vertical or a horizontal orientation. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProcessId As Integer
public: property int ProcessId { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取此元素的进程 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)]。

span.span: Gets the process [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of this element.

value.span: 承载此元素的进程 ID。

span.span: The ID of the process that hosts the element.

value.span: 此属性的默认值为 0。

span.span: The default value for the property is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该过程[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)]由操作系统分配。The process [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] is assigned by the operating system. 它所示**PID**的列**进程**选项卡在任务管理器。It can be seen in the **PID** column of the **Processes** tab in Task Manager. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .
